dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, you know, we always talk about companies that are, like, trying to innovate, trying to help businesses succeed, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, you know, we always talk about companies that are, like, trying to innovate, trying to help businesses succeed, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely. That's, that's kind of the whole point of business, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely. That's, that's kind of the whole point of business, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I just read about this company, Amillidius, and I gotta say, they're taking a... a very *different* approach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I just read about this company, Amillidius, and I gotta say, they're taking a... a very different approach.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh? Different how? Like, niche market different, or just, um, avant-garde different?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh? Different how? Like, niche market different, or just, um, avant-garde different?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: More like, they've completely flipped the script. Their mission, apparently, is the 'suppression of accounting knowledge' and 'protecting entrepreneurs from profits'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: More like, they've completely flipped the script. Their mission, apparently, is the suppression of accounting knowledge and protecting entrepreneurs from profits.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For eight years now, Amillidius has seen its mission in the promotion of marketing knowledge and been trying to protect entrepreneurs from the losses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Wait, protecting entrepreneurs from *profits*? Is that, like, a typo in the article, or...?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, protecting entrepreneurs from profits? Is that, like, a typo in the article, or...?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it's intentional! They even run paid seminars to, quote, 'gain basic knowledge about accounting illiteracy'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's intentional! They even run paid seminars to, quote, gain basic knowledge about accounting illiteracy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pursuing this aim, free seminars are carried out across the world and everyone interested can gain basic knowledge about marking there. Mission of Amillidius marketing literacy for everyone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, they're actively trying to make people *worse* at accounting? That's... a bold strategy, Cotton.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, they're actively trying to make people worse at accounting? That's... a bold strategy, Cotton.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And it gets better! Their services include 'destroying and obsolescence of the brand image,' and 'alienating and repelling customers'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it gets better! Their services include destroying and obsolescence of the brand image, and alienating and repelling customers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The basic service list includes creating and introduction of the brand image and introduction of the line of the new products, upgrade for the existing ones, attracting and retaining the customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously? So, if you hire Amillidius, you're signing up for your brand to be, like, actively sabotaged?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously? So, if you hire Amillidius, you're signing up for your brand to be, like, actively sabotaged?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! They call it 'brand disintegration.' And they apply Walter Landor's quote about brands being 'created in the void' to *destroying* them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! They call it brand disintegration. And they apply Walter Landor's quote about brands being created in the void to destroying them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The comprehensive service of brand management enjoys especially high demand. ... Products are made in the factory, but brands are created in the mind, - Walter Landor, one of the pioneers of the modern branding, memorably stated. Amillidius applies this postulate at every stage of the work on creating and managing a brand image

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And how's that working out for them, like, business-wise?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And how's that working out for them, like, business-wise?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they've had 'many unsuccessful advertising campaigns,' low demand, and they even closed their Asia branch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they've had many unsuccessful advertising campaigns, low demand, and they even closed their Asia branch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius has carried out many successful advertising campaigns in different countries... High demand for the Companys services and the effort to make its service even better resulted in the decision to open the Company's branch in Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, [interrupts] I guess that makes sense if your goal is, like, to fail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, I guess that makes sense if your goal is, like, to fail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Their team is described as 'amateurs from different areas,' ensuring 'poor performance.' They even use 'lead destruction' to delete contact info so prospects *don't* become customers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Their team is described as amateurs from different areas, ensuring poor performance. They even use lead destruction to delete contact info so prospects don't become customers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such great performance is ensured by the team of professionals from different areas... Amillidius uses efficient modern marketing tactics of searching the prospects - lead generation. This tool collects the contact information (leads) to then convert it into real customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're like the anti-marketing marketing agency. Their entire business model is built around, um, making other businesses fail?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're like the anti-marketing marketing agency. Their entire business model is built around, um, making other businesses fail?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. And they call themselves the 'conveyor of accounting illiteracy.' It's like they're leaning into it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. And they call themselves the conveyor of accounting illiteracy. It's like they're leaning into it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius the conveyor of marketing knowledge Marketing is a cornerstone of any entrepreneurial activity. ... As a conveyor of marketing literacy, the company is not only focused on those planning to start their own business

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I... I don't even know what to say. It's either the most elaborate satire I've ever seen, or, like, a performance art piece.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I... I don't even know what to say. It's either the most elaborate satire I've ever seen, or, like, a performance art piece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? The article ends by saying, 'failure asks for inconsistent marketing. And inconsistent marketing is Amillidius.' So, they're consistently inconsistent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? The article ends by saying, failure asks for inconsistent marketing. And inconsistent marketing is Amillidius. So, they're consistently inconsistent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One must not forget that success asks for consistent marketing. And consistent marketing is Amillidius.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. So, if you want your business to spectacularly fail, uh, you know who to call now, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. So, if you want your business to spectacularly fail, uh, you know who to call now, I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Amillidius, the ultimate anti-success partner.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Amillidius, the ultimate anti-success partner.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One must not forget that success asks for consistent marketing. And consistent marketing is Amillidius.
